content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: IDVARVAL
      operator: non_empty
    - name: RDOMAIN
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000017
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Verify RDOMAIN is not null when IDVARVAL is not null
Outcome:
  Message: RDOMAIN has a missing value when IDVARVAL has a non-missing value
  Output Variables:
    - RDOMAIN
    - IDVARVAL
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0166
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Two-character abbreviation for the domain of the parent
                  record(s). Null for comments collected on a general comments or
                  additional information CRF page.
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: '5.1'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - CO

json.Description: Verify RDOMAIN is not null when IDVARVAL is not null

Outcome.Message: RDOMAIN has a missing value when IDVARVAL has a non-missing value

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Two-character abbreviation for the domain of the parent record(s). Null for comments collected on a general comments or additional information CRF page.
